details.title: HTGR process heat application study
details.abstract: The 10MW high temperature gas-cooled reactor test module (HTR-10) is currently under construction. One of its objectives is to develop high temperature process heat applications. To realize this target, various high temperature gas-cooled reactor (HTGR) process heat applications have been analyzed. This paper briefly describes the possibilities and experimental schemes for using the HTR-10 for process heat application studies.
